mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insurance ( insuranceName, insuranceCost, content, type ) values ( #{insuranceName}, #{insuranceCost}, #{content}, #{type} )
INSERT INTO coverage ( insuranceID, coverageCondition, coverageContent, coverageCost ) values ( #{insuranceID}, #{coverageCondition}, #{coverageContent}, #{coverageCost} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM insurance WHERE insuranceID = #{insuranceID} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update pcustomer set insuranceName=#{insuranceName}, insuranceCost=#{insuranceCost}, content=#{content} where insuranceID=#{insuranceID}
